author: Marie-Hélène Burle
---

:::{.def}

Presented at the [Agricultural Excellence Conference](https://fmc-gac.com/programs-services/agricultural-excellence-conference/) in Abbotsford, BC, in collaboration with [Simon Fraser University's Big Data Hub](https://www.sfu.ca/big-data.html) and [BC Centre for Agritech Innovation](https://www.sfu.ca/agritech-innovation.html), this two-part workshop illustrates how big data is used in the agriculture sector, clarifies concepts, and provides the basis to communicate in the field.

Session 1 demystifies big data and covers three case studies in the agrotech industry, while session 2 presents an overview of big data challenges and provides the tools necessary to communicate with consultants to find solutions.

:::

*Coming up on November 20 and 21.*
